x-dark.title: Primary X-Dark
x-dark.description: The darkest shade of the primary color.

dark.title: Primary Dark
dark.description: A darker shade of the base primary color.

base.title: Base Primary
base.description: The base primary color intended for main use.

light.title: Primary Light
light.description: A lighter tint of the primary base color.

x-light.title: Primary X-Light
x-light.description: A very light, near white, tint of the primary base color.

x-dark.title: Secondary X-Dark
x-dark.description: The darkest shade of the secondary color.

dark.title: Secondary Dark
dark.description: A darker shade of the base secondary color.

base.title: Base Secondary
base.description: The base secondary color intended for main use.

light.title: Secondary Light
light.description: A lighter tint of the secondary base color.

x-light.title: Secondary X-Light
x-light.description: A very light, near white, tint of the secondary base color.

x-dark.title: Grayscale X-Dark
x-dark.description: A very dark shade of the base gray.

dark.title: Grayscale Dark
dark.description: A darker shade of the base gray.

base.title: Base Gray
base.description: The base gray, near white and typically used for backgrounds.

back.title: Gray Background
back.description: A light gray used for backgrounds.

trans.title: Transparent Gray
trans.description: The base gray but at 65% opacity.

accent.title: Success Accent
accent.description: A slightly lighter tint for success messaging accents.

accent.title: Error Accent
accent.description: A slightly lighter tint for error messaging accents.

accent.title: Warning Accent
accent.description: A slightly lighter tint for warning messaging accents.
